quotes.message: Protect your good image from the eyes of negative viewers, who may look at your good appearance with an ugly fiendish eye, and ruin your positive qualities with their chemical infested tongues.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Don't let people pull you into their storms. Pull them into your peace.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: People who project negativity typically have low self-esteem. They feel badly about themselves, and their negativity is simply a reflection of those feelings.
quotes.name: Hendrie Weisinger

quotes.message: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: Expect while reaching for the stars, people to whirl by with their dark clouds and storm upon you.
quotes.name: Anthony Liccione

quotes.message: When you are pursuing your dreams, they will call you CRAZY because they are LAZY. They never know you are a HERO who just jumped away from step ZERO. Stay away from negative people; they will only pollute you.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Don't let negative and toxic people rent space in your head. Raise the rent and kick them out.
quotes.name: Robert Tew

quotes.message: Avoid negative people, for they are the greatest destroyers of self confidence and self-esteem.
quotes.name: Auliq Ice

quotes.message: You cannot expect to live a positive life if you hang with negative people.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Some people grumble that roses have thorns; I am grateful that thorns have roses.
quotes.name: Alphonse Karr

quotes.message: Stop letting people who do so little for you control so much of your mind, feelings and emotions.
quotes.name: Will Smith

quotes.message: If they disrespect you to your face imagine what they're doing behind your back.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: People who try to bring you down everyday aren't important in your life, so you better treat their opinions as such.
quotes.name: Terry Mark

quotes.message: It is easier to avoid the effects of others' negativity when we question if an action or attitude is appropriately directed at us. If it isn't, we can choose to sidestep it and let it pass.
quotes.name: Sue Patton Theole

quotes.message: Sensitive souls draw in the negativity of others because they are so open.
quotes.name: John Gray

quotes.message: Never make negative comments or spread rumors about anyone.
quotes.name: Brian Koslow

quotes.message: Dwelling on the negative simply contributes to its power.
quotes.name: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.message: Negative people need drama like oxygen. Stay positve, it will take their breath away.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: There are two types of people who will tell you that you cannot make a difference in this world: those who are afraid to try and those who are afraid you will succeed.
quotes.name: Ray Goforth

quotes.message: You will face your greatest opposition when you are closest to your biggest miracle.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: No matter how good you are, someone is always going to be against you. But never let them be the limit of your success.
quotes.name: Terry Mark

quotes.message: Whatever you do, good or bad, people will always have something negative to say.
quotes.name: W.H. Auden

quotes.message: If you attach to the negative behavior of others it brings you down to their level.
quotes.name: Guru Singh

quotes.message: He who walks with wise men will be wise, but the companion of fools will suffer harm, Let go of the friends who are no longer uplifting you. Spend time with people who inspire you to be better.
quotes.name: Proverbs 13:20

quotes.message: A negative and toxic person never feels teased with the genuine presence of the pretenders in his network and he always feels pleased with the absence of the genuine leader in his circle.
quotes.name: Anuj Somany

quotes.message: The whole world can gossip about you, and if you don't take it personally you are immune.
quotes.name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.message: You can, you should, and if you're brave enough to start, you will.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: There is little difference in people, but that little difference makes a big difference. The little difference is attitude. The big difference is whether it is positive or negative.
quotes.name: W. Clement Stone

quotes.message: I don't have time to distinguish between the unfortunate and the incompetent.
quotes.name: General Curtis Le May

quotes.message: If toxic people can't stop your mission, they will set out to distract you while you are maintaining your mission.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Toxic people cannot tolerate consideration of others.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: When you share something about yourself with toxic people, they immediately turn the account into a story about them.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Sharing doesn't exist when communicating with toxic people.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Toxic people come in all flavors.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: When people are toxic, they are masters at feigning innocence, of playing the victim, pretending to be less fortunate than others, and claiming that life has treated everyone better than it has treated them.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Instead of trying to make toxic people happy or satisfied, live to help reliable people serve and worship God.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Instead of trying to make toxic people happy or satisfied, live to help reliable people serve and worship God.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Sometimes, you can't walk away from toxic people entirely.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Toxic individuals drain us of joy, energy, and peace.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Because toxic people exist, we need to learn how to play defense.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Toxic relationships leave us drained, and we all experience them.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Toxic people ruin family gatherings. They assault friendships. They can run businesses into the ground.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Resolve today that the toxic people won't take you down or even distract you.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: When a toxic person is attacking you, you don't have to participate.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: If someone is trying to control you, that itself is toxic.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: If someone is trying to control you, that itself is toxic.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Toxic people aren't just difficult people. They're not 'unsaved' people. They're not merely unpleasant people. The toxic people we're talking about are the kind of people who are basically taking you down and destroying your mission.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: Toxic people are often ruled by selfishness and spite. They are usually draining instead of encouraging, and they use people instead of loving them.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: When a toxic person doesn't get his or her way, their next gambit is often to make your motives sound sinister.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: When healthy persons are in conflict with the world, they automatically assume that they are at fault, but when toxic people are in conflict with the world, they automatically assume the world to be at fault.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: The healthy people who desire to take responsibility for their lives are said to drive themselves crazy while toxic people drive everyone else crazy.
quotes.name: Gary Thomas

quotes.message: I have come to realize that toxic people will never take acountability for their actions.
quotes.name: Dr. Sherrie Campbell

quotes.message: A toxic person is never at fault - or so he or she thinks.
quotes.name: Dr. Sherrie Campbell

quotes.message: Toxic people cannot fanthom that other people have needs of their own.
quotes.name: Dr. Sherrie Campbell

quotes.message: Toxic people operate more like a funnel than a waterproof bucket.
quotes.name: Dr. Sherrie Campbell

quotes.message: Toxic people do not think. operate, or play by the same rules we do, and our failing to recognize this sets us up by default for manipulation and unhappiness.
quotes.name: Dr. Sherrie Campbell

quotes.message: Toxic people do not care about the results of their actions because they are driven by an all-consuming need for fuel.
quotes.name: Dr. Sherrie Campbell

quotes.message: Toxic people are largely untreatable.
quotes.name: Dr. Sherrie Campbell

quotes.message: Toxic people spread destruction and death to those who come in contact with them.
quotes.name: Dr. Sherrie Campbell

quotes.message: Toxic people will pollute everything around them. Don't hesitate. Fumigate.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: You can't fix or repair or save toxic people.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Toxic men can distress women who are rich, poor, beautiful, plain, fat, thin, tall or short. They can make miserable women from any religion, race or culture anywhere in the world.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Toxic men not only make you feel bad, they make you look bad.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Having a toxic man in your life can affect your physical appearance and how you come across to others.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale
